sql:
SELECT viz2.c5050c.recno AS "object_name" , round(((viz2.c5050c.U_B/1000.0))::numeric,2)+round(((viz2.c5050c.B_V/1000.0))::numeric,2)+round(((viz2.c5050c.Vmag/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "U" , round(((viz2.c5050c.Vmag/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "V" , round(((viz2.c5050c.B_V/1000.0))::numeric,2)+round(((viz2.c5050c.Vmag/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "B" , round(((viz2.c5050c.B_V/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "B-V" , round(((viz2.c5050c.U_B/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "U-B" , round(((viz2.c5050c.R_I/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "R-I" , viz2.c5050c.SpType AS "spectral_type"
FROM viz2.c5050c
WHERE viz2.c5050c.recno = '1457'
Limit 100
